mapper.select: SELECT * FROM withdraw WHERE M_IDX = #{m_idx } ORDER BY W_IDX DESC
mapper.insert: insert into withdraw( m_idx, w_idx, id, name, phone, with_method, with_amount, with_status, commission, reg_date) values(seq_member.nextval, SEQ_WITHDRAW.nextval, #{id }, #{name }, #{phone }, #{with_method }, #{with_amount }, #{with_status }, 1000, sysdate)
